product_name: Ortlieb Vario QL3 Backpack Single Pannier
long_description: The Ortleib Vario QL3 Backpack pannier offers easy conversion between backpack and pannier, plus the delightfully easy Quick-Lock3 attachment system and waterproof protection. Made of tough, longlasting waterproof nylon fabric, it features a roll-top with rip-and-stick closure and offers space for files and up to a 15.4 in. laptop. Low-profile and easy to use, the Quick-Lock3 (QL3) attachment system allows quick and single-handed pannier or pack mounting and removal; rack sold separately. Included backpack system features a padded back panel along with adjustable shoulder and sternum straps, keeping the Vario comfortable carrying it off the bike. Mounting hardware for a rear bike rack is also included, completing the pannier-to-pack functionality and allowing you to easily adjust pannier positioning. Helmet carry loop holds your helmet when its not on your head; top handle doubles as part of the QL3 engagement system and as an easy tote handle. Features 2 outside non-waterproof neoprene pockets and a zippered front pocket; when not in use, the padded backpack carrying system can be stored in front pocket. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. PVC-free construction of the Ortleib Vario QL3 Backpack Pannier offers protection against dust penetration and water splashes from all directions.
short_description: The Ortleib Vario QL3 Backpack pannier offers easy conversion between backpack and pannier, plus the delightfully easy Quick-Lock3 attachment system and waterproof protection.
